## For devel, should be installed with Desktop Debian/Ubuntu
pycairo
PyGObject

## Dev tools
setuptools
setuptools-scm
pytest
pytest-cov
coverage 
rope
black
twine

## Flake8 & plugins
flake8
pep8-naming
flake8-builtins
flake8-blind-except
flake8-comprehensions
flake8-string-format
flake8-pep3101
flake8-bugbear
